name: insta-token-monorepo
description: Sistema de monetização Instagram com assinatura Mercado Pago

scripts.build: npm run setup:deps && npm run compile:frontend && npm run copy:frontend && npm run setup:prisma
scripts.setup:deps: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.prisma:push: cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy

author: Eduardo Lemes
